alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wabash, Grant, Blackford, southern Huntington, southwestern Adams, southern Wells and northwestern Jay Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Andrews to near Swayzee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Bluffton, Hartford City, Gas City, Berne, Upland, Fairmount, Montpelier, Jonesboro, Sweetser, Swayzee, La Fontaine, Van Buren, Pennville, Matthews, Sims, Converse, Warren, Lancaster and Nottingham. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 253 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central, north central, northeastern and east central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wabash; Wells
